price: Nuti iyya tokkittii isaan irratti ergine. Ergasii akka caccabaa mooraa horiin irra deemee tahan.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnā ʿalayhim ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fakānū kahashīmi al-muḥ'taẓiri
